title: 30 - Langston Kerman
itunes:title: 30 - Langston Kerman
description: If you don’t already know Langston Kerman from HBO’s Insecure or Amazon’s The Boys or his own hilarious standup, you’re in for a real treat. We spent a ton of time hanging out at the Edinburgh Fringe this year, eating wings, and talking shit, so this is basically just that but in podcast form. We’re talking politics, sweaters, marriage, and public urination. Here are five words to describe this episode: just go pee, okay lady?
content:encoded: If you don’t already know Langston Kerman from HBO’s Insecure or Amazon’s The Boys or his own hilarious standup, you’re in for a real treat. We spent a ton of time hanging out at the Edinburgh Fringe this year, eating wings, and talking shit, so this is basically just that but in podcast form. We’re talking politics, sweaters, marriage, and public urination. Here are five words to describe this episode: just go pee, okay lady?
itunes:author: All Things Comedy
